result.reason: Useful UX feature to surface dynamic groups (Connected, Recent) in the connection tree, making active/frequent connections easier to reach.
result.approach: Add a SmartGroupType enum and a SmartContainerInfo subclass that auto-populates from ConnectionsService: one group filtering by IsConnected state, another tracking a bounded MRU list updated on connection open; render them as read-only virtual nodes at the top of the connection tree.
